GSP28msbh1-7u:801: 268*} upalabdhā, aparedyur api sa evaiṣiṣyati. itarathecchānupapannā{*1/269*} syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:802: atrāha{*1/270*} - anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:803: yan na pramāṇenāvagatam. vijñānāt tāvad anyan{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:807: 273*} nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ. na ca tasmin asati vijñānasadbhāvo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:808: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. kṣaṇikatvaṃ cāsya pratyakṣapūrvakam eva. na ca jñātari vijñānād anyasmin asati jñāne cānitye aparedyur icchānupapannā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:812: 275*} eṣiteti. idaṃ tu dṛṣṭaṃ yat kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anya icchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:813: kvacin na. samānāyāṃ santatāv anya icchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:815: atrocyate - na hy asmartāra icchantīty upapadyate. na cādṛṣṭapūrve{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:819: pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vā smṛtir ity ucyate. tac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:822: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. anyasmin skandhaghane 'nyena skandhaghanena yaj jñānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:824: 279*} nātatsantatijena. tasmāc chūnyāḥ skandhaghanā iti. athāsminn arthe{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:825: 280*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:828: atrocyate{*1/282*} - naitad evam. anyedyur dṛṣṭe 'paredyuḥ - aham idam adarśam iti bhavati pratyayaḥ. pratyagātmani caitad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:842: 287*} vayam - imam arthaṃ vayam evānyedyur upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:843: vayam evādya smarāma iti. tasmāt - vayam imam artham avagacchāmo vayam eva hyo,
GSP28msbh1-7u:846: 289*} hyo 'dya ca, na te vinaṣṭāḥ. athāpy asminn arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati. sa vā ayam ātmeti prakṛtyāmananty aśīryo na hi śīryata iti. tathāvināśī vā are 'yam ātmā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:848: 290*}. vinaśvaraṃ ca vijñānam. tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:850: 292*} avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śakyam evam avagantum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:854: nopalabhyante tathā bhavantīti. tathā hi sati - śaśo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:856: 293*}. na cāhampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:857: bādhakapratyayābhāvāt. tasmāt sukhādibhyo vyatirikto 'sti. evaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:859: āha - yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:860: vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām - idam tad īdṛśam ceti. na ca tan nidarśyate. tasmān na tato 'nyad astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:861: atrocyate - svasaṃvedyaḥ sa bhavati. nāsāv anyena śakyate draṣṭum. katham asau nidarśyeteti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:863: 295*} kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati na ca śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:864: na ca tan na śakyate nidarśayitum ity etāvatā nāstīty avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:865: evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:866: anyasya draṣṭus taṃ puruṣaṃ prati darśanaśaktyabhāvāt. so 'py anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:868: 296*}. tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:870: 297*} iti. athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:873: 298*}. pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - agṛhyo na hi gṛhyateti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:874: 299*}. pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:876: 300*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotir bhavatīti{*1/301*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:880: 304*}brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - sa eṣa neti nety ātmeti hovāceti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:882: 306*} evaṃrūpa iti na śakyate nidarśayitum. yac ca paraḥ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:883: tatpratiṣedhas tasyopadeśopāyaḥ. śarīraṃ paraḥ paśyati. tenātmopadiśyate. śarīraṃ nātmā. asti śarīrād anyaḥ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:886: 309*} tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate. tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgair upalabhyante. te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:889: na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api puruṣapravṛttyānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:890: yadāsau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate, ataḥ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:891: 311*} pravṛttyāvagamyate nūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchatīti{*1/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:892: upamānāc copadiśyate yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:893: anenopamānenāvagaccha - aham api tādṛṣam eva paśyāmīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:894: yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣīta - dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:897: 313*} me bhavatīti. ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:898: yad apy{*1/314*} ucyate - vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:900: na śakyam upāyam antareṇopeyam upetum. ayam evābhyupāyo jñātavyānām arthānāṃ yo yathā jñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:901: sa tatheti. tad yathā - kaḥ śuklo nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:902: yatra śuklatvam asti. kiṃ śuklatvaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:904: yac chuklaśabda uccarite pratīyate. tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:905: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati. apratīte 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva. na hi vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:906: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣa ity etat pūrvam evoktam. tad avaśyakarta[24]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:907: 315*}vye 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:908: 316*} uktam eva. tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:909: atha yad uktaṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:911: atrocyate - atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam āpīpadad iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:919: yad uktam - na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:920: mā bhūd vidhiśabdaḥ. svargakāmo yajeteti vacanāntareṇāvagatam anuvadiṣyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:1715: uktam - nityaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandha iti. tad anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1717_0: punar asya kriyamāṇasyārthenākṛtakaḥ saṃbandho nopapadyate. na hi prathamaśrutāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:1717_1: chabdāt kaścid arthaṃ pratyeti. kathaṃ punar anityaḥ śabdaḥ. prayatnād uttarakālaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1717_2: dṛśyate yataḥ. ataḥ prayatnānantaryāt tena kriyata iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1718: nanv abhivyañjyāt sa enam. neti brūmaḥ. na hy asya prāg abhivyañjanāt sadbhāve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. saṃś cābhivyajyate nāsan.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1721_0: no{*1 /322*} khalv apy uccaritaṃ muhūrtam apy upalabhāmahe. ato vinaṣṭa ity avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1721_1: na ca san nopalabhyate. anupalaṃbhakāraṇānāṃ vyavadhānādīnām abhāve 'py anupalambhanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1725: *{1/322: E1 gibt als v.l.: na cainam uccaritaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1729: mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1730: na te nūnam avagacchanti sa evāyaṃ śabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1734: tad ekasya nityasyānupapannam iti. asati viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvam. kāryāṇāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate 'nekadeśasaṃbandhaḥ. tasmād apy anityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1738: yakāro vikṛtir ity upapadiśanti. yad vikriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1743: api ca bahubhir uccārayadbhir mahān śabdaḥ śrūyate. sa yady abhivyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1744: bahubhir alpaiś coccāryamāṇas tāvān evopalabhyeta. ato manyāmahe nūnam asyaikaikena kaścid avayavaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1752: 324*} uktam - prayatnād uttarakāle darśanāt kṛtako 'yam iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1753: 325*}. yadi vispaṣṭena hetunā śabdasya nityatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1754: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt prayatnenābhivyajyata iti bhaviṣyati. yadi prāg uccāraṇād anabhivyaktaḥ prayatnenābhivyajyate. tasmād ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1760: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - uccaritapradhvasta iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1761: 326*}. atrāpi yadi śakṣyāmo nityatām asya vispaṣṭaṃ vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1762_0: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt kadācid upalambhaṃ kadācid anupalambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:1762_1: upalambhasya nimittaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ. tac ca saṃyogavibhāgasadbhāve sati bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1762_2: saṃyogavibhāgāv evābhivyañjakāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ. uparatayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ śrūyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:1762_3: iti cet. naitad evam. na nūnam uparamanti saṃyogavibhāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1763: yata upalabhyate śabda iti. na hi te pratyakṣā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1764: yadi śabdaṃ saṃyogavibhāgā evābhivyañjanti na kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1765: ākāśaviṣayatvāc chabdasyākāśasyaikatvād ya evāyam atra śrotrākāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1769: tasya vāyavīyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgā vāyvāśritatvād vāyuṣv eva kariṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1770: yathā tantavas tantuṣv eva paṭam. tasya pāṭaliputreṣv anupalambho yuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1774: tena dūre yac chrotraṃ tena nopalabhyata iti. naitad evam. aprāptāś cet [28]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1775: 328*}saṃyogavibhāgāḥ śrotrasyopakuryuḥ. saṃnikṛṣṭavikṛṣṭadeśasthau yugapac chabdam upalabheyātām. na ca yugapad upalabhete. tasmān nāprāptā upakurvanti. na ced upakurvanti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1777: naitad evam. abhighātena hi preritā vāyavas timitāni{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1778_0: 330*} vāyvantarāṇi pratibādhamānāḥ sarvatodikkān saṃyogavibhāgān utpādayanti. yāvad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1778_1: vegam abhipratiṣṭhante. te ca vāyor apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogavibhāgā nopalabhyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1778_2: anuparateṣv eva teṣu śabda upalabhyate noparateṣu. ato na doṣaḥ. ata eva cānuvātaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1787: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - śabdaṃ kuru mā kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1795: *{1/333: E1,5; E2,6: saṃvāhe (E1 gibt saṃvāhe als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1799: 334*} sato nānādeśeṣu yugapad darśanam anupapannam iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1800_0: 335*}. ādityaṃ paśya devānāṃpriya. ekaḥ sann anekadeśāv asthita iva lakṣyate. kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1800_1: punar avagamyata eka āditya iti. ucyate - prāṅmukho devadattaḥ pūrvāhne saṃprati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1800_2: purastād ādityaṃ paśyati. tasya dakṣiṇato 'vasthito na dvau paśyati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:4955: aryamā vāṃ vibhajatv ity ekārthāḥ sarve vibhāgam abhidadhati. nanu bhagaviśiṣṭād vibhāgād aryam aviśiṣṭo 'nyo vibhāgaḥ. nety ucyate, [133]{*2/

GSP28msbh1-7u:4962: 162*}. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medhaḥ sumanasyamāna iti{*2/

GSP28msbh1-7u:5000: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity āyuḥkḷpter anyā prāṇakḷptiḥ. nanu sāmānyamātram idaṃ tan na viśeṣaṇabhedād bhedam arhatīti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5025: ugraṃ vaco apāvadhīt tveṣaṃ vaco apāvadhīt svāhā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5041: ucyate - yāvati śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum. kaś cāsau?

GSP28msbh1-7u:5304: na tadāyam artho 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sat tayābhisaṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5307: tadānīm āgneya ity ayam asyāntikād apy upanipatito bhavati saṃbandhābhāvān nānena saṃbandham arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5308: aṣṭākapāla āgneyo bhavatīti. athāgneyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhavatīti vivakṣyate. tadāgneyapuroṅāśayor asaṃbandha eva syāt. atha paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālasyāgneyatā vidhīyate. vaktavyam{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5309: 211*}, kena tasyām aṣṭākapālo vihita iti. atha tasyām āgneyasyāṣṭākapālatā. tathāpy eṣa doṣaḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5312: 213*} syāt. atha dravyadevate paraspareṇa viśiṣṭe satyau paurṇamāsyā saṃbadhyeyātām ity ucyate. āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo yaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5314_0: tasyāprasiddhatvād etad apy ayuktam. atha kenacid agnaye saṅkalpitaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5314_1: vidhīyate. tathāpi devatāyā avidhānād rūpābhāva eva. athāgnir devatā bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5316: na hy āgneyaśabdo 'nuvādo vidhiś ca bhavatīti. kalpayiṣyāmo devatām iti cet. na,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5321_1: āvāsyāsaṃyuktau nāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau. yat tūktam - paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau
GSP28msbh1-7u:5321_2: lakṣaṇayā prakṛtān yāgānanuvadituṃ śaknuto nāñjasyeneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5336: ugrāṇi ha vaitāni havīṃṣy amāvāsyāyāṃ saṃbhriyante,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5339: aindra uttare dva iti vyavadeśo nāvakalpeta,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5353: agnīṣomāv upāṃśu yaṣṭavyāv ajāmitvāya iti. tatra sandehaḥ - upāṃśuyājamantarā yajatīti kiṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakānāṃ prakṛtānāṃ yāgānāṃ samud-āyasya vācakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5354: atha vāpūrvasya yāgasyeti. tata ucyate - paurṇamāsīvad upāṃśuyājo bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ - nāmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5358_0: prakṛtāś copāṃśuguṇakā yāgā vidyante. tasmāt samudāyaśabda iti. nanūpāṃśuguṇakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5358_1: yāgāntaram upāṃśutvena rūpeṇa rūpavad vidhīyate. na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabda upāṃśuviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5363: avyutpannaḥ punar upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ. tasmān na rūpavad yāgāntaram. athāpi nāmasaṃyuktaṃ yajatisāmānyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5364: tathāpy anupadiṣṭadevatādravyarūpaṃ na yāgāntaraṃ pratipadyemahi. nanv evaṃ sati prakṛtānām apy avācakaḥ prāpnoti. mā bhūd upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5366: tathā saty upāṃśuyājaśabde 'py anuvādatvād anāñjasye 'pi na doṣaḥ. [145]{*2/219*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5380: nanv idānīm evoktaṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyanta iti. na vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5382: te vidhayo viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayaḥ. arthavādā hi te. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5384: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti etad etasmin vākye vidhī-yate. yadīme 'pi vidhīyeran, bhidyeta{*2/

GSP28msbh1-7u:5386: na ca yāgasya vidhānam. nanu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5387: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīty atrāpy antarālasaṃbandho 'vagamyate. vāḍham{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5388: 222*}, sa tu vidhīyata upāṃśutvādisaṃbandhaḥ. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyaṃ nānekaṃ vidhātum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5389: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyata ity evam upakramam etad vākyam ajāmitvāyety evam antam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5390: tasya madhye samāmnātaṃ viṣṇvādivākyaṃ tena saṃbandhya-mānaṃ na vākyāntaraṃ bhavitum arhati. tasmād viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayo na vidhayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5391: kiṃ tarhy arthavādāḥ. kaḥ punar arthavādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5394: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti vihitam. kathaṃ tena bhiṣajiṣyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5396: yathā viṣṇur yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatir agnīṣomau ceti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5399: na tv antarālasaṃbandhasyānyat prayojanam asty ato vidhānāt. kathaṃ viṣṇvādayo yaṣṭavyā ity etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5400: yaṣṭavyān ayaṣṭavyān vā viṣṇvādīn upāṃśuyājābhiṣṭavāya saṅkīrtayatīti gamyate. [146]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5401: 224*} tatra kecit tāvad āhuḥ - prāptā eveti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5402: śākhāntare vidhānād iti. yady apy aprāptiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5403: tathāpy upāṃśutvasāmānyāt prajāpatir devatā viṣṇuś cety anuvādāv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5406: tad upāṃśv eva kriyata ityevamādisaṅkīrtanān mantrasamāmnānāc ca viṣṇum aprāptam api prāptam iva vadet. agniṣomayos tu vidhāyakam udāhriyate - etāv abrūyātām{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5407: 225*} agnīṣomāv vājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5423: upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti. tasmān na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5429: agryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaved ayam agrya iti matiḥ. tasmān na samudāyaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5440: payasā juhotītyevamādi. tatra sandehaḥ - kim ūrdhvam [147]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5442: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir āghārā homāś ca vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5445: utaitāv evāpūrvayor āghārahomayor vidhātārāv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5448: etayoḥ pūrvebhyo homāghārebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam asti. yataḥ karmāntaram adhyavaseyam. ataḥ prakṛtatvāt{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5465: havanaṃ homaḥ. yady āghāraṇasāmānyaṃ homasāmānyaṃ ca vidhīyete,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5479: na ca, prakṛtam api dravyadevatam āghāre vidyate. yena rūpavān syāt. tasmād etāv api samudāyaśabdāv iti. [150]{*2/231*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5493: tena karmāntare vidhīyeta ity avagacchāmaḥ. āghārāgnihotraśabdau ca havanāghāraṇasāmānyavācinau prajñātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5494: ato nāvijñātārthau. tena rūpavantau santau vidhīyete.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5496: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir vihitatvād anuvādāv iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5497: na hy ete homāghārau vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti. ūrdhvam āghārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5498: dadhnā juhotīti ca naitad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5503: dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād arāptatvān nānuvādau. nanu saṃbandhe vihita arthād dhomāghārau bhaviṣyataḥ. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5504: asmin hi sati vidhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nārthād āpadyete homāghārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5508_0: na dadhyūrdhvatādisaṃbandhaḥ. satyaṃ na śrūyate. tasmin nidher guṇārthena vyāpāraśravaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5508_1: avakalpiṣyate. nanu padārthāntaragataṃ vyāpāraṃ śrutir na śaknoti vaditum. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5510: taṃ tu svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdo viśekṣyati, sa eva{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5512: viśiṣyāt svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdaḥ, na tv eṣa{*2/

GSP28msbh1-7u:5514: avyāpriyamāṇe 'pi guṇe śabdārthāvakḷpto bhaviṣyati. guṇavacanasannidhir idānīṃ kim arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5519: asati tv arthe kim anyad ucyeta. evaṃ tarhi vākyād bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5520: śrutyarthe sati na vākyārtho 'vakalpyate. satyam evam etat. avivakṣite tv avakalpiṣyate. katham avivakṣā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5522: svapadārthasya ca śabdāntareṇa vihitatvāt. tasmāt siddham - guṇārthena dadhnā juhotītyevamādīnāṃ punaḥśrutiḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5523: 236*}. juhoter uccāraṇaṃ cānuvādo guṇasaṃbandhārthaḥ. yadi juhotīty anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5525: dadhiśabdeneti mā vocata. nanv idānīm eva vākyād guṇavyāpāro{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5526: 237*} gamyata ity uktam. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5528: pramāṇam asya nāvagamyeta. asati pramāṇe vyāmohaḥ syāt. evaṃ tarhi vidhāyakau juhotyāghārayatiśabdau. kasya tarhy anuvādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5533: vākyārtho yas taṃ vidhātum ity adoṣaḥ. tasmāt karmāntaracodane. yad uktam - nāsty āghāre prakṛtaṃ dravyadevatam iti. kim evaṃ sati dravyadevatena,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5538: 238*}, evam asāv indravān yady asyendro devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5556: prakaraṇe hy anarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena // MS_2,2.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5557: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5572: ye ime ālabhatiyajatibhyāṃ karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām iti cintyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5573: pūrvam eva ta avadyatigṛhṇātibhyām avagamite. na cāvagamito 'rtho vidhīyate. hṛdayādīṃs tu paśuśabdenānuvadati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5574: somaśabdena ca rasam. tasmāt somena yajetety anuvādo yajatiḥ yajeta svargakāma iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5575: 245*} phalasambandhārthaḥ. paśum ālabheteti cālabhatir agnīṣomasaṃbandhārthaḥ. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5576: daśaitān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇātīti samuccayo dṛśyate. tathāśvino daśamo gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5577: tṛtīyo hūyata iti ca kramaḥ. yadi cāpūrvau yāgau vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5581: pālāśe badhnāti rohitake badhnātīti. tatra kramasamuccayadarśane nopapadyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5583: yajatau samyag etad avakḷptaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5584: [151]{*2/246*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhānacodane paśusomayoḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5585: soma-śabdaḥ kṣīriṇyāṃ latāyāṃ prasiddho na rase,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5586: ākṛtivacano hi somaśabdo na vyaktivacanaḥ. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5587: śṛṅgiṇi pucchavati lomaśe catuṣpadi dravyaviśeṣe paśuśabdam ākṛtivacanam upacaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5589: evam ākṛtikadravyāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyante. yeṣām imau samudāyasyānuvaditārau bhaveyātām. nanu paśu-vikāro hṛdayādiḥ paśuśabdenāgnīṣomasaṃbandhārtham anūdyate. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5591: nāyaṃ prakṛto hṛdayādiḥ paśur iti. tatra yadi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5592: laukikasya paśor grahaṇaṃ tato mukhyaḥ paśuśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5595: somaśabdo 'pi vikārasaṃbandhenānuvādaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrve karmaṇī vidhīyeyātāṃ nānuvādau. athaindravāyavādiṣu prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu latā vidhīyeteti. ucyate - na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5597: śrutyā hi rasa aindravāyavaḥ. tasmād dravyasaṃyogavacanaḥ prakṛteṣu yāgeṣv api satsu vidhātum anuvadituṃ vā na śaknuvann anarthakaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrvakarmaṇī vidhīyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5610: evaṃ tāvat, prakṛteṣu satsv api nānuvādāv ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5612: prakṛtā eva yāgā na santīty ucyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5619: aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītīndravāyubhyāṃ saṃkalpayatīty etāvad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5620: tatra yāgam antareṇa saṃkalpayatīty etan na yujyata iti yāgaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5624: prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvān na samudāyaśabdo yajatiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5631: tadbhedāt karmaṇo 'bhyāso dravyapṛthaktvād anarthakaṃ hi syād bhedo dravyaguṇībhāvāt // MS_2,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5632: paśau vṛttā kathā daśame punar udbhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5633: soma idānīṃ vartate. kathaṃ kramasamuccayāv iti. indravāyvādyā devatā naivaṃ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5638: kevalayā hi devatayā tadā yāgo nirvartyata iti vihitam abhaviṣyat. atha punar imāḥ adṛṣṭārthaṃ gṛhṇāti saṃskāraṃ prati devatā vidhīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5640: tena gṛhṇātau tatkṛtād adṛṣṭād adṛṣṭāntaram utpādayati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5644: tathāpi nityavihitānāṃ devatānāṃ vikalpapakṣe tāvat prayogavacano mā bādhīty ava[153]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5647_0: tad eva mitrāvarūṇābhyām iti nāvakalpeta. tasmāt kalpanabhedāt pṛthagavasthitaḥ somo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5647_1: nānādevatatvād eva naikyena śakyaḥ kartum. na cāsati devatāyāge devatābhyaḥ śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:5647_2: saṃkalpayitum. tasmād avaśyaṃ yathāsaṃkalpitā devatā yaṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5648: tāsu cejyamānāsu jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti śruto yāgo nirvṛtta eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5650: kṛtsnena ca daśamuṣṭinā somena yāgaḥ śrutaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5653: 251*} somena saṃpanno bhaviṣyati. tasmiṃś cābhyasyamāne kramasamuccayau yuktāv eva bhavataḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5679: atha saptadaśapaśuguṇakam ekaṃ karmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:7837: na hy ayam aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ kāraṇam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:7936: aruṇāśabdena saṃbadhyamānaś ca jñatavat. vākyabhede punar na doṣo bhavati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9121: kiṃ tāvat prāptam. prakaraṇe ca mantro liṅgena vidhīyamāno dāśatayībhya evāgamayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9122: āgneyītyevamādibhir hi śakyā dāśatayo 'bhivaditum. yaś cāyaṃ prakṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9124: nehāpy upadeśam arhati. upadiṣṭopadeśo hi na nyāyya evaṃjātīyakasya. kathaṃ jātīyakasya?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9130: tato nopadiṣṭo bhavati. athopadiśyate - evaṃliṅgena karotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9132: tenopadiṣṭasyaivaṃjātīyakasyaivaṃjātīyakaḥ punar upadeśo na nyāyyaḥ. tasmād dāśatayā liṅgavanto mantrā grahītavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9133: nanu prakaraṇasāmarthyataḥ prakṛtā grahītuṃ nyāyyāḥ. nety ucyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9139: 178*}, tato bādhemahi liṅgam. ubhayaṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ ca. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9143: sa pratyayo liṅgajanito yan mithyeti kalpyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9150: sā ca prakṛte mantra upādīyamāne niravaśeṣā upāttā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9151: dāśatayāṃ punar mantravyaktāv upādīyamānāyāṃ prakaraṇād yā mantravyaktiḥ prāpnoti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9177: sa cānyaś ca sāmānyena liṅgena. naivaṃ sati kiṃcid duṣyati. nanv etad duṣyati - nobhayam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9179: kiṃ tv ananugrāhyam eva prakaraṇaṃ liṅgapratyayaviruddhatvāt. api ca na liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahītavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9181: yad avagamyate - etat phalavad iti. tatra pravartate. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9183: na liṅgam anugṛhītaṃ kvacid ity aparasmiṃs tatparicchinne na pravṛttir bhavitum arhati. tasmād dāśatayo grahītavyā iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9202: na jyotiṣṭomaṃ prati mantrasya vyāpāravidhānam upapadyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9213: nanu ca prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasyopakārakaṃ syāt. yady upasthānajyotiṣṭmasaṃbandho vivakṣyeta,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9232: yad apy uktam upadiṣṭā hi te prakṛtāḥ kāryantara iti. tad ucyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9243_0: bhakṣamantraḥ śrūyate - bhakṣe hi mā viśa dīrghāyutvāya śaṃtanutvāya rāyaspoṣāya

GSP28msbh1-7u:9243_2: sadhyāsam. nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā deva soma sucakṣā avakhyeṣam. hinva me gātrā harivo gaṇān me mā vitītṛṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9244: śivo me saptarṣīn upatiṣṭhasva mā me 'vāṅ nābhimatigāḥ mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānaṃ vāg juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9247: 189*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsna eṣo 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9252: bhakṣayāmīty eṣa śabdo vyaktaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9260: 190*} mā me vāṅ nābhimatigā ity evam antaṃ samyag jaraṇārtham. tad bahutvād arthānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9261: bahūni vākyāni. katham etac chakyaṃ vadituṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9262: ucyate - sarvāṇy etāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇānīty uktam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9263: evam api bhidyeta vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāṃ yugapad vacanāsaṃbhavāt. ucyate - na viśeṣaṇāni vivakṣiṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9264: viśeṣaṇair grahaṇāvekṣaṇādibhir viśiṣṭa eko 'rtho vivakṣyate. naivaṃ samyag bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9267: lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9272: bhakṣaṇam evaikaṃ pratyāyayitavyam. tad dhi śrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9276: tāvad ekaṃ vākyam. tasmād viśiṣṭabhakṣaṇārtham etad ekaṃ vākyam iti bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyam. samākhyānaṃ ca bhavati - bhakṣānuvāka iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9278: nanu ca samākhyā laukikaḥ śabdaḥ kathaṃ vaidikam aṅgaṃ niyaṃsyatīti. yady api laukikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9279: tathāpy anādiḥ tasyānuvākena saṃbandhaḥ. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9283: yathā pācako lāvaka iti samabhivyāhārāt saṃbandham anumāsyāmahe. āha nānumānagamya evaṃjātīyakeṣv aṅgabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9286: na ca samākhyā vidhātrī. atrocyate - samākhyā saṃbandhinau buddhau saṃnidhim upaneṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9287: prayogavacano vidhāsyatīti. tasmāt kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavya iti. [264]{*3/191*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9296: naitad evaṃ kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti. rūpād grahaṇavākyaṃ grahaṇe viniyujyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9297: ehītyevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antam. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādi cāvakhyeṣam ity evam antaṃ darśane. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9302: na kiṃcid asti prayojanam ity uktam. atrocyate - naivaitāni viśeṣaṇāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9303: pṛthag evaitāni grahaṇādīni svaiḥ svair vākyair ucyanta iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9308: tāny avaśyaṃ prakāśayitavyāni. tāni prakāśayiṣyanty etāni vākyāni. rūpaṃ caiṣāṃ tatprakāśanasāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9309: ato nānārthatvān naikaṃ vākyam ucyate. nanu bhakṣaṇavākyaśeṣī bhavitum apy eṣāṃ rūpam iti. ucyate - bāḍham asti rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9310: na tu tadviśeṣaṇāny etāni kalpyante. kasya hetor adṛṣṭārthāni tathā bhavanti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9311: uktair anuktair vā viśeṣaṇais tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9313: tathā dṛṣṭārthāni bhaviṣyanti. tasmād rūpopadeśābhyām apakrṣo bhavet keṣāṃcid atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9315: guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syāt tayor ekārthasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.26 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:9317: 192*}ṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu. vasu-mad guṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandaso 'gnihuta{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9319: 194*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ mandrādiḥ tṛpyatv ity evam anta eko mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9321: uta mandrādir bhakṣayāmy anta eka eva mantra iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9325: tato 'rthabhedād vākyabhedaḥ. tad uktam - tasya rūpopadeśābhyām apakarṣo 'rthasya coditatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9326: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9332_0: tatra dvayoḥ kriyayor asti saṃbandho bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti. iha punar bhakṣayāmi
GSP28msbh1-7u:9332_1: tṛpyatv iti nāsti kaścit saṃbandhaḥ. ucyate - na hy ayaṃ vidhau tṛpyatv iti vijñāyate. kva tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9333: prārthanāyāṃ vā prāptakāle vā. yadi bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīty evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate. yadi vā bhakṣayāṃi vācas tarptuṃ prāptaḥ kāla iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9334_0: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvād ekārthatāyām ekavākyatve mantraikyam upapadyate. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:9334_1: nirākāṅkṣa ete vākye bhaṅktvā rūpaṃ sākāṅkṣe kriyete. atrocyate -yady apy ete vākye
GSP28msbh1-7u:9335: tathāpi bhakṣaṇasya prakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ na tarpaṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9336: iti kṛtvaikārthyam eva bhavet. kim aṅga punar guṇabhāve gamyamāna evātra. tasmād guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti. [266]{*3/196*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9346: eṣa eva mantra udāharaṇam - iha ca pradānāny aindrāṇy anaindrāṇi ca vidyante,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9349: anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:9354: asati vacane 'nyārthānabhidhānāt. tasmād amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam evaṃjātīyakeṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9356: yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati // MS_3,2.28 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:9371: ato 'naindreṣv api codakaprāpto mantra ūhitavyo bhavati. ucyate - vikārā eta iti liṅgam apadiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9372: nyāyo 'bhidhīyatām iti. ucyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9373: tenaindreṣu somo 'naindreṣu soma eva nāstīti sarve somadharmā aindreṣv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9374: adharmakā itare sākāṅkṣāḥ. kathaṃ punar jñāyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ceti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9376: indrāya tvā vasumata ityevamādir mantra aindraṃ somaṃ vadituṃ śaknoti nānyam. tasmād aindraḥ somaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9379: ato dharmān grahīṣyantīti nyāyaḥ. tasmād yathādevatam ūhitavyo mantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9386: santi punarabhyunnītāḥ somāḥ śukrāmanthipracāra eva savanamukhīyāḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9434: 207*}vita iti. ucyate - āśrāvyate tatra devatābhyo na tv idaṃ vā tad veti. tena{*3/

GSP28msbh1-7u:9462: tatra hi pātralakṣaṇatvena saṃkīrtyate na somo grāhyatvena,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9466: 210*} ca, tatra yas tasmād āgrayaṇād gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9468: yas tu saṃpātānn āsau pātnīvata iti. ucyate - āgrayaṇo 'pādānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9472: [270]{*3/212*} nanv anāgrayaṇād apy apetaḥ. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9474_0: tenāsau pūrvadevatābhiḥ pīta iti na śakyate vaktum. yo hīndrārthasya somasyāvayavaḥ

GSP28msbh1-7u:9476_0: na hi hutasyāvayavo dṛśyate. nanu prakṛtāv api hutasyāvayavo na dṛśyate. ucyate -

GSP28msbh1-7u:9993: tasmād bhavati liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. na ca liṅgaprāmāṇye vinigamanāyāṃ hetur asti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9996: śruter gārhapatya iti. avirodhāt khalv apīmam evārthaṃ pratipadyāmahe. balīyān api hetur virudhyamānm abalīyāṃsaṃ bādhitum arhati nāviruddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10000: nanv ayam eva virodhaḥ - sakṛd upasthānaṃ coditam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10001_1: evaiṣa na virodhaḥ. ayaṃ tarhi virodhaḥ - gārhapatya upasthīyamāne 'gnivacana indraśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10001_2: guṇaṃ kriyāyogaṃ vāpekṣamāṇo bhavitum arhati. indre tūpasthātavye nirapekṣa indra[288]{*3 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:10002: 278*}vacana eva, gauṇamukhyayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyaya iti. neti brūmaḥ - virodhe mukhyena gauṇo bādhyeta,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10005: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasī. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10008: śrutyārthaḥ. gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10011: 279*} anena mantreṇendra upasthātavya iti na śrūyate. saty apīndrābhidhānasāmarthye vacanābhāvād anupasthānīya indra ity eva gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10012: nanv idam uktam - prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgam ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10014_0: uktam evaitat - dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syād iti. yad etat prakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10014_1: liṅgaṃ cobhayam apy etad śabdam. na cātikrāntapratyakṣaviṣaya evaṃlakṣaṇake 'rthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:10014_2: śabdam antareṇa paricchedo 'vakalpate. ato manyāmahe - viprakṛṣṭaṃ śrutyarthāl liṅgam

GSP28msbh1-7u:10015_1: evaitena śrutir virotsyata iti. tatra śrutiliṅgayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:10016_0: atrocyate - itikartavyathārthinaḥ prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāv upanipatito mantra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10016_1: āmnānasāmarthyād itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vākyaśeṣatām abhyupetyaitena mantreṇa yajeteti. kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10018: na cāntareṇendrābhidhānam ayaṃ mantra upakartuṃ śaknoti, [289]{*3/

GSP28msbh1-7u:10025: tasmān nāpramāṇam. yatas tu khalv ānumānikīm ekavākyatāṃ liṅgasāmarthyaṃ cāpekṣya śrauto 'yam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10032: anena mantreṇa gārhapatya upastheya iti. tatra vijñātam etad evam ayam upakaroti mantra ity etasmiṃś ca nirjñāte kṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor naitad evaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10035: anyāyyaś ca vikalpaḥ. tatra hy abhāvaḥ pakṣe nityavac ca,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10038: śrutaṃ ca hīyate. yāvāṃś ca śrutasyārthasyotsarge doṣaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10041: atha yad uktam - sati virodhe nyāyyo bādhaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10047: 281*} akṛtasāmarthyābhyāṃ ca śakyaṃ bhavitum. tasmād virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10050: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suṣevaṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10051: 282*} kalpayāmi. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamāna iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10052: 283*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsno mantra upastaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10054: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ puroḍāśāsādana iti. yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10065: yathā liṅgaṃ prati śruter balīyastvam uktam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10068: na ca balīyaḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyate bādhitum. tenāsya bhaṅguratām adhyavasyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10071: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgavākyayor liṅgaṃ balīya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10073: prakaraṇavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnānād darśapūrṇamāsāṅgam ayaṃ mantra ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10074: tasmin sīdeti puroḍāśāsādanābhidhānasāmarthyāt sādane viniyujyamāne kṛtasāmarthyaṃ mantrāmnānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10075: nāsti pramāṇaṃ yenopastaraṇe 'pi viniyujyeta. tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomīty{*3/

GSP28msbh1-7u:10084: tan mukhyam. tasmin sīdety asya punaḥ pūrveṇa sahaikavākyatām upagatasya bhavati jaghanyam. tad atra pūrvasya mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyād upastaraṇe viniyoga ukto bhavatīti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10088: 290*} eṣa śabdo yady apy uttareṇākāṅkśita iti sādane 'pi prayogam arhati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10100: api cottareṇaikavākyatām upagatasya na kiṃcid api dṛṣṭam asti kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10102: śrutatvād upastaraṇasya sādanasya ca. evam uttarasya sādanapratyāyanam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10105: atha yad uktam - śrutyāpi tad bādhitam iti vākyenāpi tad bādhitavyam iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10106: na hi bādhitasyānyenāpi bādhanam eva nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10111: atha vākyaprakaraṇayor virodhe katham iti. kiṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10112: kartavyasyetikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vacanaṃ prakaraṇam. prārambho hi sa tasyā vacanakriyāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10113: na eṣa vidhyādir vidhyantāpekṣaḥ. vākyaṃ tūktam eva. tayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10114: sūktavākanigadaḥ. tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatā amāvāsyādevatāś cāmnātāḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10119: 294*}, sa kiṃ yāvat kṛtvaḥ sūktavāke samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10120: tāvat kṛtva ubhayoḥ paurṇamāsyam āvāsyayoḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10124: vākyaṃ balavattaram iti. evaṃ sarveṣu saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10130: tasmāt tulyabala iti. athavā vākyaṃ durbalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10132: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10134: vākya ekaikaṃ padaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10138: itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya samīpa upanipatitaṃ pūrṇam iti tasya prakṛtasya sākāṅkṣatvam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10139: naikavākyabhūtam ity anumīyate. ekavākyatayā cābhidhānasāmarthyam avakalpyābhihito 'yam evaṃ bhavatīti parikalpanā. eṣo 'trārthaviprakarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10142: 296*} praharatīti paurṇamāsīdevatāvācinām amāv āsyā devatāvācināṃ ca niṣkṛṣya prayoge tac cheṣāṇām api niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10143: tena yady api prakaraṇasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīdevatāpadaśeṣāṇām amāv āsyā devatāvācibhiḥ sahaikavākyatānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10144: pratyakṣā tv amāv āsyā devatāpadaiḥ saha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10145: na ca pratyakṣavirodhe 'numānaṃ saṃbhavati. arthavati ca prakaraṇe saṃjāte na nirākāṅkṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā śakyopapādayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10146: atha yad uktam - liṅgenāpi hi tad bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10149: tad bhaṅguram anyatrāpīty avagantavyam. atha bhaṅguram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10150: pramāṇam eva nābhaviṣyat. kiṃcit tu prati kasyacit prabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10151: vākyasya prakaraṇaṃ prati bādhakaśaktir na tu liṅgaṃ prati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10152: liṅgaṃ prati viprakṛṣṭārtham etat prakaraṇaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10154: [294]{*3/297*} atha prakaraṇasya kramasya ca virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10162: yenāvagacchāma idaṃ balīya iti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti. api ca prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10164: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇaṃ kramād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10169_0: anekasyāmnāyamānasya saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānamātraṃ hi kramaḥ. tatra saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānasāmarthyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10169_1: kramavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnātasyānupalabhyamānam evākāṅkṣāvattvam astīty avagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10170: na ca prakaraṇavatā kramavatā ca yaugapadyenaikavākyatā saṃbhavaty āmnātasyeti virodhaḥ. tatra prakaraṇe pratyakṣaṃ sākāṅkṣatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10173: sāmarthyāc chrutyartha iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasya śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10174: viprakṛṣṭaḥ kramasya. tasmāt krama karaṇayoḥ prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10175: atha yad uktam - vākyenāpi hi tad bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10181: kiṃ balavattaram iti. pauroḍāśikam iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sāṃnāyyakrame śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya kramaṇa iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10182: 299*} śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ. tatra saṃdihyate - kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvāt puroḍāśa[295]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10184: uta kramasya balīyastvāt sāṃnāyyapātrāṇām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10189: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kramo balīyān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10191: nirjñāte prakaraṇena kenāpi sahaikavākyatve yat saṃnidhāv āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10194: laukikaś ca śabdaḥ samākhyā. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10195: loka evaṃvidheṣv artheṣu pramāṇam. tasmāt kramo balīyān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10196: yady evaṃ bhavaty evaṃlakṣaṇakeṣu krameṇa viniyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10197: na tv arthāviprakarṣāt kramo balīyān. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10198: dvayor hi pramāṇayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10204: ity etad atra puruṣapramāṇakam. bhavati cāsminn arthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10207: vedaśabdaś cāyam iti. na hy ete 'nindriyaviṣayā arthā upapadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10209: ye tv anindriyaviṣayās teṣv abhiyuktā na pramāṇam. tasmāt samākhyā kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10210: kāraṇatve ca sati balīyastvaṃ parīkṣyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10211: ucyate 'rthaviprakarṣas tarhi vaktavyaḥ samākhyāyāḥ. ayam arthaviprakarṣaḥ. upadiśyate hi krame samāmnānāt sāṃnāyyasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10213: śabdam uccāryamāṇam upalabhyārthāpattyā nūnam astīti kalpyate. tasmāt pūrvavedārthaviprakarṣāt krameṇa samākhyā bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10214: atha yat tatra tatrocyate - idam anena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10222: prāptaṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ pūrvavijñānam iti brūmaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10223: sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāt. atha kathaṃ nivartate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10228: na tan mithyā. tad eteṣāṃ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat paraṃ paraṃ prati balīyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10229: naitasyotpannasya vimṛṣyamāṇasya bādhakaṃ vijñānāntaram asti. tasmāt teṣāṃ samavāye virodhe{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10268: *{3/303: E2,4: naiva hi tannivartate. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10274: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10275: 306*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dvādaśopasattā jyotiṣṭoma utāhīna iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10278: evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati. nanu vākyena bādhyate. na bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10281: dakṣiṇayā kratukaraṇair vā phalena vā na hīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10288: asaṃyogāt tu mukhyasya tasmād apakṛṣyeta{*3/308*} // MS_3,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10291: ahīnenaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣatvāt. nanu jyotiṣṭoma eva gauṇo 'hīnaḥ. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10292: na hi mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇagrahaṇam arhati. nanu nañsamāso bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10295: 309*}. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvāhīnasya dharmaḥ. api ca vyapadeśo bhavati - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti. yady anyaḥ sāhno 'nyaś cāhīnaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10305: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10310: 315*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - jyotiṣṭoma eva niviśete pratipādāu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10311: uta dviyajñaṃ kiṃcit kulāyādiṃ bahuyajñaṃ ca dvirātrādim utkraṣṭavya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10329: iti cet paśyasi - partipadāv utkraṣṭavya iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10330: prakaraṇaṃ hi bādhyeta. bādhyatām asaṃyogād dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānair jyotiṣṭomasyeti cet. asaty api vacane 'rthād dvau yajamānau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10334: tathā yaṣṭavyam iti bādhitvāpi kāṃcit prāptiṃ yajamānaḥ sahāyam upādāsyate. evaṃ prakaraṇe pratipadau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10340: na kutaścic codakena prāpyante. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10341: yady evam, pratyakṣaśrutā na śakyā bādhitum. vikṛtau tu codakaprāptāḥ santa ānumānikā bādhyerann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10342: vivakṣitaṃ hi jyotiṣṭome kartur ekatvaṃ pratyakṣaśrutaṃ na sāmarthyena bādhyate. yatrāpi hy avaśyakartavyatā śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10343: tatrāpy eka eva yajamānaḥ śrūyate - vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeteti. tasmāj jyotiṣṭomād utkraṣṭavya ete pratipādāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10344: atha kasmāt patnyabhiprāyam etan na bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10347: dvayor bahuṣu vā patnīṣv ete 'sṛgram indava iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10348: yathā kṣaume vasānāv agnimādadhīyātām iti kṣaumavasānaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10349: evam ihāpi pratipad vidhānaparam. ucyate - asaṃbhavāt tatra mukhyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10352: iha tu dviyajñe bahuyajñe ca saṃbhavati na lakṣaṇāśabdo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10353: bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti. yad apy etad dvivacanaṃ dvayor yajamānayor iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10356: pumān striyety asāv api lakṣaṇāśabda eva. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10357: upāsmai gāyatā nara iti pratipador niravakāśatvam eva syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavye ete pratipadāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10362: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim etad vidhānaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10364: kathaṃ ca paśāv iti. yadi jāghanyāṃ patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante tata utkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10365: atha patnīsaṃyājeṣu jāghanī vidhīyate tato darśapūrṇamāsayor eva. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10371: nanu patnīsaṃyājā vihitā eva. satyaṃ vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10373: sā tatsaṃbaddhā kartavyety ucyate. evaṃ sati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ patnīsaṃyājā vināpi jāghanyā na viguṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10374: jāghanī tu tatra pratipādyate. tasmād yatra jāghanī prayojanavatī tatra tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10377: 320*}māsayoḥ. ekadeśaś ca jāghanī pratipādyamānā na paśuṃ prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10383: jāghanī vā patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena vidhīyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10384: apūrvatāt, aprāptā jāghanī patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena. tatra svaśabdena patnīsaṃyājā vihitā jāghanīsaṃbandhas teṣām avihitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10387: saṃbandho nāntarīyakaḥ. yad vā saṃbandhasya vidhānaṃ nāntarīyakau saṃbandhinau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10394: kaścid eva tu lakṣyate yasya patnyaḥ sādhanatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10395: atha kasmān na jāghanīṃ lakṣayitvā patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10397: jāghanyāṃ tu lakṣyamāṇāyāṃ yāge sapatnīke vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asti tv atra vihitaḥ sapatnīko yāgo ya patnībhir lakṣyate. tasmād yāgaṃ lakṣayitvā jāghanī vidhīyate. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10399: tad iha yāgavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīty uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10400: vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. tasmāj jāghanīvidhānam. evaṃ ced darśapūrṇamāsayor vinā jāghanyā viguṇaḥ patnīsaṃyājayāgaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10404: atha yad uktam - ekadeśo jāghanī na paśuṃ prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10411_0: na prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayor jāghanī śāstrenocyate. evaṃ paśor niṣpannayā jāghanyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10411_1: patnīsaṃyājā yaṣṭavyā iti. aviśiṣṭā jāghanī vidhīyate. sā saṃbhavati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ krītyāpy ānīyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10414: saṃtardanaṃ prakṛtau krayaṇavad anarthalopāt syāt // MS_3,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10416: 322*} prakṛtya śrūyate - dīrghasome saṃtṛdyād dhṛtyā iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10417: 323*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10418: āhosvid dīrghakāleṣu someṣv iti. ucyate - naital luptārthaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10419: tasmān notkṛṣyeteti. āha nanv asaṃtardanam api śrūyate - asaṃtṛṇe{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10422: 326*}, yathā hiraṇyena krīṇāti gavā krīṇātītyevamādīnāṃ vikalpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10423: evam atrāpi vikalpo bhaviṣyati - saṃtardanam asaṃtardanaṃ vā bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10436: 327*} saṃtṛdyād iti. jyotiṣṭomam apekṣya satrāṇi kālato dīrghāṇi bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10441: notkṛṣyeta vā saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭomāt. evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10446: na caitad asti - jyotiṣṭome saṃniveśa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10453: dīrghakāle some punaḥ punar grāvabhir abhihanyamāne somābhiṣavaṇaphalakayor dāraṇaśaṅkāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10459: atha kim arthaṃ saṃsthāsu na niveśaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10461: dīrghasomaśabdaś ca. dīrghakālo hy agniṣṭomam apekṣyokthyādiṣu saṃsthāsu soma iti. ucyate - na saṃsthāsu dīrghakālatve 'pi some 'rthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10462: tāvān eva hi tatra somo daśa muṣṭīr mimīta iti vacanāt. tatra dhāraṇe na viśeṣaḥ kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10473: pradānāni hi vivardhante. tāny avivṛddhe pradeye na śakyāni vivardhayitum. pūrṇe grahe grahaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10474: tena na śakyāni nyūnāni pātrāṇi grahītum. tasmād dāraṇāśaṅkāyāṃ dhāraṇam āśaṃsitavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10478: iti cet paśyasi - saṃsthāsv apy arthavādo 'vakalpate pradeyavivṛddhyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10484: ukthyādiṣv api daśamuṣṭir eva somo grahītavyaḥ. nanv arthāt pradeyaṃ vivartsyatīti. daśamuṣṭiḥ sa kathaṃ śakyeta vivardhayitum?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10485: triparveti ca parvasaṃkhyāniyamān na śakyo bahuparvā grahītum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10492: prakaraṇānugrahāt. arthāc ca pradeyavivṛddhyā dāraṇaśaṅkāyām arthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10494: viprakṛṣṭaparvā somo grahīṣyate. api ca tṛtīye savana 'śur eko 'bhiṣūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10495: tasya pramāṇaṃ ca nāmnātam. tam anekaparvāṇaṃ sthūlaparvāṇaṃ ca grahīṣyati, [304]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10503: jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya samāmnāyate - na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyād dvitīye tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭome sarveṣv eva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10504: uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10507: prathamaśabdena yajño 'bhidhīyate jyotiṣṭomaḥ. tasya hi prathamasaṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10508: evaṃ samāmnāyate - eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10509: 330*} yaj jyotiṣṭomo ya etenānṣṭvāthānyena yajeteti. yajñānāṃ prathama iti kṛtvā prathamaśabdena jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10511: yadi krator eṣa vādaḥ. tasmāt saṃkhyāyuktaḥ pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomasya pravargyaṃ pratiṣedhed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10515: naimittikaṃ vā kartṛsaṃyogāl liṅgasya tannimittatvā // MS_3,3.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10516: na caitad asti - yajñasyaiṣa vāda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10522: kartṛsaṃyogāt. pūrvasya dvitīyādīn apekṣya prathamaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10526: śrutiś ca balīyasī na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt prathame prayoge na pravarjitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10527: atha yad uktam - jyotiṣṭomena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tad vacana iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10528: laksaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti tat parihṛtam. yat tu prathamayajña iti yajñaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10534: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetācodanāt prakṛtau // MS_3,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10535: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi sa iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10536: 333*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10539: prakaraṇāt. nanu prakṛtau pūṣaṇaṃ na kasyacid dhaviṣo devatāṃ samāmanantīti. ucyate - prākṛtīṃ kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10540: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yatra pauṣṇaṃ havir asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10543: tasmād utkraṣṭavyaṃ peṣaṇam iti. yad uktam - kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10545: yady anyatrāpi mukhyaḥ pūṣā na syāt. nanv anyatra kriyamāṇe prakaraṇam uparudhyeta. uparudhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10546: vākyaṃ hy asyoparodhakam. athavā naivātra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10547: evam eva prāptam ucyate - pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau na prakṛtāv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10558: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ vikṛtāv ity uktam. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ carau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10561: uta carāv eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10562: tat sarvatra syāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10566: carau vā, arthoktaṃ puroḍāśe 'rthavipratiṣedhāt paśau na syāt // MS_3,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10567: carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ viniyujyeta. puroḍāśe tāvat peṣaṇam arthād eva prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10569: tad arthaṃ tāvan na vacanam. paśau ca na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10570: hṛdayādiṣu piṣyamāṇeṣu teṣām ākāravināśaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10573: tathānyad apy avadānaṃ na yathāśrutād avadāsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10574: nanu śakyate piṣṭebhyo 'pi hṛdayādibhyo 'vadātum. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10580: tasmāc carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10586: iti cet paśyati bhavān - arthavipratiṣedhān na paśvartham [307]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10589: piṣyamāṇo hi piṣṭakaṃ yavāgūrvā syāt khalir vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10594: atrocyate - satyaṃ viśadasiddha odane caruśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10596: na tv asya viśadasiddhir nimittam. yadi viśadasiddhir nimittaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10597: na piṣṭasiddhe prayujyeta. tatrāpi hi prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10601: tad etad ucyate - na paktināmatvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10605: carur iti. anavasrāvitāntaruṣmapākenābhinirvartyasya bhavati caruśabdo vācakaḥ. tena piṣṭa odane viśadaudane ca prayoktāro bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10611: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau bhavati carāv evety uktam. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kim ekadevatye pauṣṇa etad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10613: rājasūya uttare trisaṃyukte saumāpauṣṇe ekādaśakapāle aindrāpauṣṇaś caruḥ śyāvo dakṣiṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10627: apiṣṭa itarasya syāt. tatra viṣamaḥ pāko bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10628: pākanimittaś ca caruśabdaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta. athāvirodhaṃ manyamānā aparasyāpi bhāgaṃ piṃṣyuḥ. bhāgasaṃmohaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10632: api vā sadvitīye syād devatānimittatvāt // MS_3,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10633: devatānimittam etat peṣaṇaṃ śrūyate - pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10634: sa ca dvidevatye 'pi bhāge piṣyamāṇe prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10636: tatra hi tad dhito nirapekṣasya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10639: na sadvitīyasya. iha tu prapiṣṭaśabdasya bhāgaśabdena sahānyapadārtho bahuvrīhiḥ samāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10641: na tv atra dvidevatye kaścid evaṃjātīyako doṣaḥ. tasmād ekadevatye dvidevatye 'pi vā carāv asya bhāgaḥ peṣṭavya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10644: liṅgam apy evaṃ bhavati - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10645: 340*}, devatānimittaṃ peṣaṇam iti stutir darśayati. tathā saumāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapen nemapiṣṭaṃ paśukāma iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10646: 341*} nemapiṣṭatāṃ darśayati. tathārdhaṃ piṣṭam ardham apiṣṭaṃ bhavati dvidevatyatvāyeti devatānimittam eva peṣaṇaṃ darśayati. [309]{*3/342*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10653: vacanāt sarvapeṣaṇaṃ taṃ prati śāstravattvād arthābhāvād dvicarāv{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10656: nemapiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kasmād etan na vacanam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10658: yadi vacanam etad bhavet saumāpauṣṇamātram anūdya sarvatra peṣaṇaṃ vidadhyāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10660: 344*} carusaṃbandhe nemapiṣṭasaṃbandhe cobhayasmin vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. tasmād yo yaḥ saumāpauṣṇas tatra tatra nemapiṣṭatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10663: puroḍāśe 'rthāt sarvapeṣaṇe prāpte 'rthābhāvāc ca paśau carau vāpeṣaṇe prāpte vacanam idaṃ bhavet. tatra caruśabdo na vivakṣitasvārthaḥ syāt,

GSP28msbh1-7u:11069: sa ca saṃyogo bādhyate. tasmāt puruṣadharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11072: 400*} dvādaśopasattā prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. evaṃ jañjabhyamānasaṃyogān mayi dakṣakratū iti vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11079: prakaraṇaviśeṣād vā tad yuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat // MS_3,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11084: 401*}dinā. nanu na śaknoti prakaraṇaṃ jañjabhyamānaśabdam ekadeśe 'vasthāpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11085_0: vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇād balavattaram iti. ucyate - na brūmo jañjabhyamānaśabdaḥ prakaraṇenāprākaraṇikāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:11085_1: puruṣān nivartyata iti. kiṃ tu phalaṃ tatra kalpanīyam. nanu pratyakṣaṃ śrūyate phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11086: prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti. neti brūmaḥ - nātra vidhāyakaṃ śabdam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11089: vartamānāpadeśa eṣa na vidhāyakaḥ. stāvakas tu bhavati mantravacanasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11090: tasmād darśapūrṇamāsābhyām anyatraitan na phalavat. ataḥ puruṣasya darśapūrṇamāsau kurvataḥ saṃskārakarmeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11092: darśapūrṇamāsāv eva kurvata ity etan na. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11098: saṃskṛtena tu tena nāsti prayojanam. nanu prakaraṇe puruṣasaṃskāreṇāpi nāsti prayojanam. ucyate - saṃskṛtapuruṣo darśapūrṇamāsāv anuṣṭhāsyati. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11099: utkarṣe 'pi sati saṃskṛto 'nyad anuṣṭhāsyati. ucyate - nānyasya saṃskāro guṇo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11101: vākyena puruṣadharma ity avagamāt. ucyate - ānarthakyān na puruṣadharmo 'vagamyate. tasmād asya prakṛtābhyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ekavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11106: 402*} pakṣe brūyād - ity anuṣṭhānavacanam avivakṣitasvārtham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11119: tathedam apy utkraṣṭavyam iti. ucyate - tad dhi vākyenāhīnānāṃ vyapadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11120: phalavantaś cāhīnāḥ. na ca tatra jyotiṣṭome 'hīnaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11122: vyapadeśāc ca tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11123: 405*}. tato yuktaṃ dvādaśopasattā yat prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. na tv iha puruṣasaṃbandho niṣprayojanatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11129: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - devā vai śaṃyuṃ bārhaspatyam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti prakṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11130: vacanam idaṃ bhavati - kiṃ me prajāyā iti te 'bruvan yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret taṃ śatena yātayād yo nihanat taṃ sahasreṇa yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11131: yo lohitaṃ karavat yāvataḥ praskandya pāṃsūn saṃgṛhaṇāt tāvataḥ saṃvatsarān pitṛlokaṃ na prajānīyād iti. tasmān na brāhmaṇāyāvaguren na hanyān na lohitaṃ kuryād iti{*3/406*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11134: prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor avagoraṇādipratiṣedhaḥ. na darśapūrṇamāsyor brāhmaṇasyāvagoritavyaṃ vadho vā kāryo lohitaṃ vā praskandanīyam. anya upāya āsthātavya ānataye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11136: 407*} iti prakaraṇāt prāpnoti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śaṃyau ca prakaraṇād utkarṣaḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11139: na darśapūrṇamāsagatenaiva nāvagoraṇādi kartavyam iti. nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsadharmo 'yam. satyaṃ prakaraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11142: nanu jañjabhyamānasyeva prakaraṇe niveśo bhavet. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11144: iha kḷptam. asti hy atra vidhāyakavibhaktiḥ - śatena yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11153: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - malavad vāsasā na saṃvadet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11155: 408*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ malavad vāsasā saha darśapūrṇamāsāṅgasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11156: uta puruṣasya sarvatra pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11158: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - malavad vāsasā saha saṃvāda utkṛṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11160: prāgaparodhāt. evaṃ śrūyate - yasya vratye 'hani patny anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya yajeteti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11161: 409*}. patnyā ca saha saṃvādo 'dhvaryor darśapūrṇamāsayor asti - patni patny eṣa te loka iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11166: yataḥ pratiṣedham arhet. tasmād utkṛṣyeta malavad vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11174: annapratiṣedhaś ca bhavati - nāsyā annam adyād abhyañjanaṃ vai striyā annam ity{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11176: 413*} vidhīyate, sa ca prakaraṇe na prasakta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11182: aprakaraṇe tu taddharmas tato viśeṣāt // MS_3,4.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11183: anārabhya śrūyate - tasmāt suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvarṇo 'sya bhrātṛvyo bhavatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11184: 414*}. suvāsasā bhavitavyaṃ rūpam eva bibhartīti. tatra kiṃ prakaraṇadharma uta puruṣadharma iti saṃśayaḥ. atrocyate - aprakaraṇe tu tad dharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11188: 415*} viśeṣo 'sya, nāyaṃ prakaraṇādhītaḥ. yady aprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11189: sarvaprakaraṇadharmaḥ syāt. aprakaraṇe samāmnānaṃ na kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ kuryāt. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11199: 416*} chravaṇāt, bhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyam iti parikalpyeta. asati tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe vibhartir ayaṃ dhāraṇāvacanaḥ saṃskāravācī, [327]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11201: tasmāt karmaṇām agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ. evaṃ suvāsasā bhavitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11210: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi karmaṇāṃ sāṅgānām aṅgānām ardhvayuḥ kartā. tasmād api karmadharmā evaṃjātīyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11213: dravyaparaś cātra bhavati nirdeśaḥ - suvarṇaṃ bhāryam iti dvitīyārthasaṃyogāt. dravyasaṃskāraś ca karmaśeṣapakṣe prayojanavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11216: syād vāsya saṃyogavat phalena saṃbandhas tasmāt karmaitiśāyanaḥ // MS_3,4.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11217: syād vā phalenaivaṃjātīyakānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ puruṣadharma ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11218: suvarṇasya vāsaso vā dharmo bhavan niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. nanu saṃskṛtena suvarṇena vāsasā ca karma setsyati. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11219: suvarṇasyāṅgaṃ na karmaṇa upakuryāt. śrutyādīnām abhāvān na karmāṅgam. tasmāt durvarṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavatītyevamādinā evaṃjātīyakānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11221: ānarthakyaparihārāya phalacodanayā saṃbandha eṣi-tavyo bhavati. anyasmāc caiṣitavyād ekavākyagatasya vipariṇāmo{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11226: saṃbandhasya ca tātparyādhyavasānam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ pradhānakarmopadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11227: yathā prajāpativratānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ. etāvatā hainasāviyukto bhavatīti. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11233: iha karmasaṃyuktā homā jayādaya udāharaṇam. yena karmaṇetsat{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11238: uta vaidikānām agnihotrādinām iti. śeṣatvaṃ tu nirjñātakarmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11248: na caitad asti - sarvakarmaṇāṃ karṣaṇādīnām apy aṅgabhūtā iti. homā ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11250: āhavanīyasaṃyogo bhavati homeṣu. yadāhavanīye juhoti tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11253: 423*} ca kṛṣyādīny āhavanīye vartante. na caiṣāṃ gārhapatyo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11254: yataḥ praṇīta āhavanīyaḥ syāt. tasmān na karmaṇādīnāṃ jayādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11260: itaś ca paśyāmo vaidikānāṃ śeṣabhūtā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11262: ādhvaryavam iti hi samākhyāte vede jayādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ santo 'dhvaryuṇā kariṣyante. karṣaṇādiṣv adhvaryor abhāvād anadhvaryuṇāpi kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyāṃ bādheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11265: doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāc chāstrād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11266: asty aśvapratigraheṣṭiḥ - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11271: atha vaidika iti. kaḥ punar laukiko 'śvapratigrahaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11272: ko vā vaidika iti. loke bhikṣamāṇo vābhikṣamāṇo vā yatrāśvaṃ labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11273: tatra laukikāśvapratigrahaḥ. vaidiko 'pi pauṇḍarīke 'śvasahasraṃ dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭome gauś cāśvaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11275: 425*} ucyate - doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāt. doṣo hi śrūyate - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11278: sa ca laukike 'śvapratigrahe śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ kṛto bhavatīty upapadyate. doṣasaṃyogāl laukika iti gamyate. āha na doṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ prāyaścittaviṣayaviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11279: kiṃ tu prāyaścitta-stutyarthena. ucyate - doṣanirdhātārthe saty evaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11282: loke varuṇagrahaṇasya vidyamānatvāt. vaidike tv aśvapratigrahe tan na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11284: 426*} tasya kartavyatāvagamyate. yadi ca tataḥ pāpaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11287: nanu vaidike 'pi pratigrahe 'pratigrāhyāt pratigṛhṇataḥ pāpam asti. ucyate - bhaved evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11299: yad uktam - yaḥ śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakṛto loke 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt sa etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapet. sa hi varuṇagṛhīta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11301: yasyodaraṃ jalavṛddhyā śvayati. jalodaram ity eva loke tat prasiddham. na ca tasyāśvapratigraho laukiko nidānam iti prati[331]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11302: 427*}jñāyate. na cānena vidhīyate. tasmān nāśvapratigrahāj jalodaropapātaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11304: vṛṇīta ity eṣo 'bhiprāya iti. tadā prasiddhau tyaktāyāṃ kleśamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11307: rakṣaṇapoṣaṇavicikitsādinā kleśena naiṣa pakṣo vyavatiṣṭheta - laukike 'śvapratigraha iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11308: prasiddhiś ca bādhyeta. tasmād arthavāda eṣaḥ, yāvad{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11310: tāvad etety upamānenaiṣā stutiḥ. yo 'sya pratigrahaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11316: tasmād yajñe pratīyeta. laukike hi phalaṃ kalpanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11318: tasyāṅgabhūtā bhaviṣyati. tatra prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatā saṃbandhād avakalpyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11319: parokṣāyāḥ phalavacanena sahaikavākyatāyā laghīyasīti yuktam iṣṭir vaidike dāna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11327: 429*}. tatraitat samadhigatam - vaidike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭir iti. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ pratigrahakartrā kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11334: 430*} pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataś catuṣkapālān vāruṇān nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11344: pūrvapadānām uttaraiḥ padair yathārtham abhisaṃbandhaḥ. idaṃ śrūyate - prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anyad iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11347: sa svāṃ devatām ārcchad iti. sa iti sāpekṣaṃ pūrvaprakṛtaṃ vākyaśeṣam apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11348: sa iti prajāpatiṃ pratinirdiśatīti tena sahaikyavākyatāṃ yāti. sāmānādhikaraṇyāc ca prajāpater eva pratinirdeśo 'vakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11350: vaiyadhikaraṇyāt. sa paryadīryata ity eṣo 'pi prajāpatim eva pratinirdiśati pūrvaprakṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11351: tena ca sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. sa evaitaṃ vāruṇaṃ catuṣkapālam apaśyad iti prajāpatir eveti, niravapat{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11353: tato vai sa varuṇapāśād amucyata prajāpatiḥ. varuṇa etaṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11355: yasmād eva prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvaṃ dattvā paridīrṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11358: sa paridīryata iti. yatas tu vāruṇena pratimuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11359: tasmād anyenāpy aśvaṃ prayacchatā vāruṇo nirvaptavya ity aśvasya dātur vāruṇīṣṭiḥ praśasyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11360: kartavyānenākhyātena. tasmād aśvaṃ dattvā vāruṇīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11361: āha, nanu yo 'svaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa nirvaped ity ucyate. evaṃ saty anyathopakrānte vākye 'nyathopasaṃhṛta upakramo 'py anarthakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11362: upasaṃhāro 'pi. tasmād upakrame vā śabdārtha upasaṃhāravaśena kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11365: varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād ity upasaṃhārānurodhena kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11368: yo 'śvaṃ pratigrāhayatīti. tatra - mukhyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ codanāl lokavad iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11369: 436*} prathamam anugrahītavyaṃ virodhābhāvāt. paścāt tanaṃ tu virodhāl lakṣaṇayā kalpanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11370: api ca, prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād iti bahvasamañjasaṃ kalpayitavyam. pratigṛhṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11371: pratigrāhayatīty etam arthaṃ śaknoti yayā kayācic chaktyā vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11372: yo hi tad ācarati, yena ca{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11374: sa tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ karteti śakyate vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11375: yathā ṣaḍbhir halaiḥ karṣatīti saṃvidhānaṃ kurvan vilekhanam akurvann apy ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11376: tatsamartham ācaratīti. evam ihāpi sa pratigrahasamartham ācarati yo dadāti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11377: 438*}. tasmād dadat pratigṛhṇātīti śakyate vaditum. tasmād adhyavadhāryedam avakḷptam. dadat pratigṛhṇātīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11387: *{3/438: E1 gibt yo dadāti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11390: idaṃ samāmananti - somendraṃ caruṃ nirvapec chyāmākaṃ somavāmina iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11391: 439*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - laukikasya somapānasya vamane saumendraś{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11392: 440*} caruḥ, uta vaidikasyeti. kiṃ laukikaṃ somapānam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11394: ucyate - vaidikaṃ somapānaṃ jyotiṣṭome tadvikṛtiṣu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11405: indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ pibatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:11406: 443*} loke dhātusāmyārtham āsevite vamanena vinaṣte dhātusāmyavyāpadā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11408: śās-trād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt. tatra śeṣaḥ pātavya iti śabdāc codite nirvṛtte nāsti doṣaḥ. yady api vamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11410: kṛto vacanārtha iti na doṣaḥ syāt. tasmāl laukikasya somapānasya vyāpadi saumendraḥ{*3/444*} syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11421: doṣāt tu vaidike syād arthād dhi laukike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11424: doṣāt, doṣasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate - indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyata iti. laukike punar dhātusāmyādyarthaṃ kriyamāṇe na kiṃcid duṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11425: vamanāyaiva hi taṃ pibanti loke. athāpy ayam arthavādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11426: tathāpi phalakalpanāparīhārāya vaidika eveti kalpanā nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11446: 448*} karma. tad api tad artham eva. idaṃ hi somavāmina upakārāya śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11450: na hi tad ṛtvig arthaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11451: yatra somo vamyate. athocyate - somavāmino 'dhvaryor hotur vātmīyā ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11452: tadīyeṣv agniṣu nirvartayiṣyantīti. tathā sati yadi vā vyṛddhasomasya karmaṇo nāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11454: tatrātyantaguṇabhūtā adhvaryvādayaḥ svair ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayanto na phalaṃ prāpnuvanti. tad arthaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ na yajamānasyopakāre vartata iti na ṛtvijo vamane kriyeta.

GSP28msbh1-7u:14490: 777*} asti, tan nimittaṃ bhavet. tasmān na śyenāgnyādhānayoḥ saṃbandho 'stīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14496: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ navanītam uta sarveṣāṃ iti. sutyākālānāṃ syāt,

GSP28msbh1-7u:14524: śākyānām ayanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaram. tatredaṃ samāmananti - saṃsthite saṃsthite 'hāni gṛhapatir mṛgayāṃ yāti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:14586: nānyathā. avibhakto hi puruṣārthaḥ prītyā. yo yaḥ prītisādhanaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. puruṣārthe lakṣite tadviparītaḥ kratvartha iti kratvarthasya lakṣaṇaṃ siddham.

GSP28msbh1-7u:14642: 20*} etad aṅgaṃ sad anupakārakaṃ syāt. na ca,

GSP28msbh1-7u:14709: iha prajāpativratāny udāharaṇam - nodyantam ādityam īkṣeta nāstaṃyantam ityādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvarthāni prajāpativratāny uta puruṣārthānīti. kiṃ prāptam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:15373: na vāpātratvād apātratvaṃ tv ekadeśatvāt // MS_4,1.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15374: na vā prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighāryāḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15375: śeṣābhāvāt. kathaṃ śeṣābhāva iti cet. apātratvāt. katham apātratā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15377: prayājārthasya hi gṛhītasyājyasya sa ekadeśaḥ śeṣaḥ. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15378: yady evam, ekadeśavyāpāraḥ śrūyamāṇo nāvayavinam upādeyatvena codayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15381: ekadeśatvād abhighāraṇaṃ dravyam eva na prayuṅkta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15386: ājyaprādhānye punar juhvā riktatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15389: nābhighṛtena haviṣā. tasmāt prājāpatyānām abhighāritābhir vapābhiḥ prayojanam eva nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15401: ity arthānatareṇa vapābhighāraṇam anugṛhṇan nehāstīti darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15404: abhāvaṃ khalv apy abhigdhāraṇasya darśayati - savyā vā etarhi vapā yarhy anabhighṛtāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15412: saty eva hy abhighāraṇe bhavaty etat savyavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15413: asti hi vapāyā anyad abhighāraṇam - upastṛṇāty ājyaṃ hiraṇyaśakalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15415: 116*}. tasmin sati kathaṃ savyā bhaveyuḥ? brūte{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15416: 117*} ca, tasmān naitac chakyam avagantum rūkṣās tā vapā dṛśyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15419: rūkṣās tā iti darśanaṃ vyāmoha iti{*4/118*}. [459]{*4/119*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:15424: *{4/118: E2: pratyakṣam arūkṣās tāḥ. ato rūkṣāvacanaṃ vyāmoha iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15429: saty abhighāraṇe savyā iti vacanam aliṅgam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15438: yad asmābhiḥ kāntārān nirgatair devadattasya gṛhe snigdham bhuktam{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15440: satsv apy anyeṣu snigdheṣv eva bhojaneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15441: evaṃ tasyārūkṣākaraṇasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvād rūkṣā iti vacanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15442: asmiṃs tu sati nopapadyate. tasmād api prayājaśeṣeṇābhighāraṇaṃ prājāpatyānāṃ nāstīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15448: 121*}. yadi prathamasyābhāvāt savyā iti vacanaṃ bhavaty anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15449: tarhy anyasya prathamasya vidyamānatvāt. katamat tat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15450: yac chrapyamāṇāyā aparam udvāsitāyāḥ. atrocyate - syāt tasya mukhyatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15453: saty api śrapyamāṇāyā abhighāraṇa udvāsitāyāś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15463: tan na snehayati. tad idaṃ snehanasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvāt savyatāvacanam upapadyata ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15467: *{4/121: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15471: samānayanaṃ tu mukhyaṃ syāl liṅgadarśanāt // MS_4,1.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15472: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - atihāyeḍo barhiḥ prati samānayatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15473: kiṃ samānayanam ājyasya dharmāṇāṃ ca prayojakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15477: pūrveṇa nyāyenāprayojakatā prāptā. tad ucyate - mukhyaṃ samānayanaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15479: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīty ātithyāyāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15481: tatas tatraikaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ samānīyate. ekam apy anuyājānāṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15482: tataś cātithyeḍāṃ tā saṃtiṣṭhata ity anuyājābhāva upabhṛti samānayanārtham ekaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ grāhyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15483: na tv anuyājārtham. tatra bahūnāṃ caturgṛhītānāṃ darśanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15484: itarathā hy anuyājābhāve naivopabhṛti catur gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15485: tatra caturgṛhītānīti bahuvacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmāt prayojakaṃ samānayanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15487: ucyate - dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ prayājau dvau yaṣṭavyau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15488: tatra juhvām ājyena prayojanaṃ nopabhṛti riktāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15489: upabhṛto recanam adṛṣṭārthaṃ juhvāṃ nidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham eva. tena prayājahomārtham ājyasamānayanam aupabhṛtam ājyaṃ [461]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15490: 124*} prayojayati. tad api hi prayājārtham anuyājārthaṃ ceti vakṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15498: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti. yadā samānayanaṃ na prayājārtham iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15502: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti hetuvan nigado nopapadyeta. tasmāt prayājārthaṃ samānayanaṃ prayojakam aupabhṛtasyājyasya. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15506: aprayojanakatve na niyogato 'rdhaṃ yāvat tādvat vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15509: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāty aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15515: athavā aupabhṛtaṃ prayājebhyo 'nuyājebhyaś ceti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15528: ṛtavo vai prayājā iti jauhavavacanam anuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ prayājān saṃkīrtayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15532: nāsty asyānuyājapratiṣedhe sāmarthyam iti. ucyate - na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15533: pratiṣedhakam etad iti. kiṃ tūtpattivākya ājyānāṃ naiva prayojanābhisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15535: anuyājaprayojanatāsya vacanābhāvād eva na gamyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15546: na tv aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. tad api tathā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15549: yad upabhṛti gṛhṇāty anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇāti chandāṃsi hy anuyājā iti. anuyājārthatāsyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15554: evaṃ hi śrūyate - yad aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇāti prayājānuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15555: 128*}. nanūktam, anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīty anuyājārthatāsyeti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15556: juhūpratiṣedhān nityānuvādaḥ. ubhayasminn aupabhṛte jauhave ca{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15563: tasmād aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. samānayanaṃ ca tato juhvāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15564: tasmād api prayājārthatā na śakyā bādhitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15567: *{4/129: E1 gibt aupabhṛte jauhave ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15573: kiṃ tad aupabhṛtam ājyam aṣṭasaṃkhyena grahaṇena saṃskriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15574: uta catuḥsaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā dvayor grahaṇayor iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15585: anugrahavādaś ca bhavati - caturgṛhītaṃ vā etad abhūt tasyāghāram āghārya triritaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15587: 133*} prayājān yajati samānayate caturgṛhītatvāyeti caturgṛhītānugrahaḥ kathaṃ syād iti. kiṃ caturgṛhītaṃ bhavati samānayanena?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15591: yad avaśiṣṭaṃ catuḥsaṃkhyam eva tasya grahaṇam āsīt. kiṃ tarhi caturgṛhītatvāyeti. caturgṛhītasyānugrahārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15593: tat paryāptaṃ kathaṃ syād iti. evaṃ caturgṛhītaśabdenālpam iti lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15594: alpatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ kasyacid apekṣya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15595: yadi hy aupabhṛtam aṣṭasaṃkhyam evaṃ caturgṛhītam [464]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15597: 135*} caturgṛhītaśabdena alpatā śakyate lakṣayitum. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15603: *{4/135: E2 om. caturgṛhītam alpaṃ bhavati, tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15605: dvayos tu hetusāmarthyaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca samānayane // MS_4,1.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15611: 136*}, asatsv apy anuyājeṣv etad aṣṭagṛhītam evaupabhṛtaṃ bhavet. yadāṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15612: na tadā dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoś caturgṛhītān{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15613: 137*} ājyānīti bahuvacanam ājyeṣūpapadyate. tasmāc caturgṛhīte dve iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15614: āha, liṅgam etat prāptir ucyatām iti. tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15617: tena prayājānuyājeṣv api na tad aṣṭagṛhītena śakyate bādhitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15623: tad etad ihāṣṭatvam grahaṇe bhavati. kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte home sampādayet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15625: aṣṭagṛhīte gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyete. caturgṛhīte dve nāgṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15626: 138*} kaścit sampādayet. tasmād dve ete caturgṛhīte iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15631: kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte syātām iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15632: aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīty upabhṛti samānīte dve caturgṛhīte kathaṃ syātām iti. itarathāsaty aṣṭaśabde nānāpātrayor gṛhyeyātām. tasmād aṣṭaśabdaśravaṇam adoṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15636: dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoḥ samānayane 'rdhaṃ samānetavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15637: aṣṭagṛhīte sati na niyogato 'rdham. tathā yatrānuyājārthaṃ na grahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15639: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā ca siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15644: *{4/138: E2: na hi dve caturgṛhīte agṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15649: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15652: rohite badhnātīti. tat saṃnidhāv idam aparam āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15653: svaruṇā paśum anakti yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15656: uta yūpaṃ kriyamāṇam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. tatredaṃ tāvan naḥ parīkṣyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15660: bhedena yūpān niṣpādyeta. na cet prayojakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15661: yūpaṃ niṣpadyamānam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahīṣyata iti. sa kathaṃ prayojakaḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15662: kathaṃ vā na prayojaka iti. yady eṣā vacanavyaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15668: svaruṇā paśum anaktīty anavagataḥ svaruḥ. etāvad asya{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15671: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti yūpaikadeśaṃ svarukārye 'ñjane viniyuṅkta iti tato 'prayojakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15677: svakarmaśabdatvāt. svo hy asya karmaśabdaḥ svarutāyā vidhāyako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15678: svaruṃ karotīti. evaṃ ca yūpakāṣṭāvayavasya svarutvaṃ kriyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15682: svaruṃ karotīti svarum utpādayatīti. yūpāvayavopādānaṃ vākyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15683: vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasīti. tasmād evaṃ sati na niyogato yūpakāṣṭhād eva svarur utpādayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15684: nirapekṣād anyasmād api vṛkṣāt kartavyo bhedeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15692: itaś ca nirapekṣasya svaror utpattir iti gamyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15698: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na hi yūpam anuniṣpannasya garhaṇe jātyantarāśaṅkāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15699: yūpaśakalo hi svarukārye tadānīṃ viniyujyate. tasmād api bhedena yūpāt svarur utpādayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15703: tad ekadeśo vā svarutvasya tannimittatvāt // MS_4,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15704: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yūpaikadeśo hi yūpam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15705: evam āmnāyate - yady anyasya vṛkṣasya svaruṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15707: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na cātrāyam artho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15733: yūpasyeti tu śabdo 'vivakṣitārtho bhavati. tatra śrutir api bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15734: vākyam api. na tv asmatpakṣe kiṃcid avivakṣitārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15736: yūpaśakalo vidhāyiṣyate. svaruśabdaś cāñjanārthena śakale upacarita iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15737: avayavaprasiddhiś caitam arthaṃ gamayiṣyati. bhavati hi brāhmaṇam - atha kasmāt svarur nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15748: itaś ca yūpam anuniṣpannasya grahaṇam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15752: sa svaruḥ kārya iti. śakalaś caikadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15754: saṃbandhiśabdatvāt. tāvatā ca vyavahārāt samudāyāpekṣiṇaḥ. tatra prakaraṇād anyārthena khadirādinā joṣaṇādikarmaviśiṣṭena yāgārthena prakṛtenāsyaikavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15757: takṣati ca. tatra yaḥ śakalaḥ prathamaḥ parāptitas taṃ ca svarum añjanārthaṃ karotīti. svaruśabdaṃ ca tatrānuvadann evopacarati. tasmān naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15759: 148*} yenānyasmād api vṛkṣād iti śaṅkyate. tasmāj jātyantarāśaṅkāvacanaṃ nityānuvādo yūpaśakalastutyarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15764: itaś ca na pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ svaruḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15770: 150*} svaṃ svaṃ yūpaśakalam upagūhatīti svarubahutvaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15772_0: eka evaikādaśinyāṃ tantreṇa kāryaṃ sādhayet. yūpam anuniṣpannasya tu grahaṇe prakṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:15772_1: svayūpaśakalenāñjanaṃ kṛtam ity ekādaśinyām api codakaḥ svayūpaśakalam eva prāpayatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:15772_2: bahutvam upapannaṃ bhavati. svayūpaśakalagrahaṇaṃ ca prākṛtasya grahaṇād adhyavasīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15775: na viśiṣṭa iti. tasmāt svarur utpatter na prayojaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15778: *{4/150: So E1,6, E2 (Fn.); E2 om. sve sve}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15787: svarum ādatta iti. yathā kāṣṭhāni karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15791: *{4/151: Die Ausgaben wiederholen zwischen MS 4.2.6 und 4.2.7 noch einmal MS 4.2.1-6 mit kürzerer,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15797: prācīm āharaty udīcīm āharati prāgudīcīm āharatīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15799: uta śākhāvāda iti. digvāda iti prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15801: śākhāvāde lakṣaṇeti. tasmād digvāda iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15808: vākye śākhāśabdasyābhāvād anupapanno 'yaṃ saṃbandhaḥ. atha prakṛtā śākheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15809: tataḥ prācīśabdena tasyā evābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15811: prakaraṇāc chākhāśabdena bhavet. ubhayathātra prācīśabdo lakṣaṇayā prakṛtāṃ vā śākhāṃ lakṣayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15819: sarvasyaiva deśasya kutaścit prāgbhāvāt. tathā śākhāśabdo 'pi saṃbandhiśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15820: vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate. yadā vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15824: tathā ca saṃvyavahāro 'vakalpate. yat tu śākhāvāde [473]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15826: bhavati lakṣaṇayāpi śabdārthaḥ. tasmāc chākhāvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15834: śākhāyāṃ tatpradhānatvād upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ syād vaiṣamyaṃ tat // MS_4,2.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15836: mūlataḥ śākhāṃ parivāsyopaveṣaṃ karotīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15844: ubhayaṃ ca prayojanavat. agreṇa vatsāpākaraṇādi kariṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15851: 156*} upaveṣeṇa vibhāgo bhavet. śākhām anuniṣpanno gṛhyate. kathaṃ tatprādhānyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15852: śākhāṃ parivāsyeti dvitīyānirdeśāt. nanūpaveṣaṃ karotīty api dvitīyā. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15853: nāsau parivāsayateḥ karma. kasya tarhi? karoteḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15854: āha, kasmād evam abhisaṃbandho na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15856: śākhāśabdaś ca yathaivāgre tathā mūle 'pi. tatrāyam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15865: nanu prakṛtatvān mūlam upaveṣaśabdena saṃbadhyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15866: ubhayasaṃbandhe virodhaḥ. virodhe ca prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. atha saṃnihitena saṃbadhyate,
